SELECT
r.B_NUMBER AS b_number, b.B_TITLE AS b_title, r.REPORT_DATE AS report_date, c.COMMON_MCD AS common_mcd, COUNT(r.REPORT_ID) OVER (PARTITION BY r.B_NUMBER) AS report_count FROM HELLONG.REPORT r INNER JOIN HELLONG.BOARD b ON r.B_NUMBER = b.B_NUMBER INNER JOIN HELLONG.COMMON c ON r.COMMON_BCD = c.COMMON_BCD AND r.COMMON_MCD = c.COMMON_MCD ORDER BY r.REPORT_DATE DESC
